item.title: Official Project Vildar Thread - Creating Player Dreams
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

For you that have heard of Jbirdscape if any, this server was Jbirdscape just a name change.

Key:
[color=red]Red: Not yet started on[/COLOR]
[color=orange]Orange: Started on[/COLOR]
[color=green]Green: Done[/COLOR]

Below is the servers progress;

Npcs;

[ul][li][color=green]Aggressive Attacks[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Max Hit, Attack, Defense [/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Boss Area Configuration[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]King Black Dragon[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]God Wars[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Drops[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=red]Kalphite Queen[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=red]The Inadequacy[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]1 Click Npcs[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Npc Turns To You On Click[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
Minigames;

[ul][li][color=green]Quarantine (Zombie-like minigame)[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=red]Team Wars (Two Teams Battle)[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=red]Survival Mode (Survive in Mobs of Npcs)[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Fight Pits[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Fight Caves[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
Magics;

[ul][li][color=orange]Teleports[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Normal Magic[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Ancient Magic[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Lunar Magic[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Multi Barrage[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Ancients + Quick Attack[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
Combat;

[ul][li][color=green]Follow Attack[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Stabilized Better[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]New Animations[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]New Weapons[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Range Attacking, Stoping and following within 4 tiles[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Magic Attacking, Stoping and following within 8 tiles[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
Grand Exchange;

[ul][li][color=green]Interfaces Complete[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Item Search[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=green]Item In Search Box[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Item In Sold/Buy Slot[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Buying/Selling[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Dupe Prevention[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Stabilized[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
Following;

[ul][li][color=orange]Clipped Following[/li]
[li][color=orange]PK Clipped Following[/li][/ul]
Dungeons;

[ul][li][color=orange]Dungeon Area 1[/COLOR]
[list]

[li][color=orange]Added Correct Locations[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=red]Added Drops[/COLOR][/li]
[/list][/li]
[li]Dungeon Area 2[/li]
[li][list]
[li][color=green]Added 2 Groups[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=orange]Added Correct Locations[/COLOR][/li]
[li][color=red]Added Drops[/COLOR][/li]
[/list][/li]
